summary: Ben Singer has his cynical worldview darkened by his roommate Ibu's sudden medical situation, though the arrival of Ibu's sister, Khadi, might remedy both men's ills.
cast: Matthew Broderick|Sanaa Lathan|Michael Kenneth Williams|Philip Baker Hall|Jesse Tyler Ferguson|Jodelle Ferland|Ally Walker|Christy Reese|Zacharias Foppe|Cristen Barnes|Mia Ford|Paul T. Taylor|James Burton|Dan Zanes|John Hambrick|Drew Waters|Odessa Feaster|Carrey Bowers|Linda Leonard|David L.J. George|William Ragsdale|David Jensen|Michael Showers|Thomas Ike Awagu|Patrick Michael Carney|Tammy Eaton|Ted Ferguson|Rebecca Holloway|Rick LaCour|Jimmy Lee Jr.|Cindy McBride|Eric Kelly McFarland|Amy McGee-Harrell|James Paul|Jeannie Perrin|Donnie Pierre|Johnny Rock|Charity Schubert|Charles Edward Smith|Bill Stinchcomb
title: Wonderful World
